doc.field: OSG:OSG User Certificate Request for John A. Sandy
Check for a response back from John

May I ask why you submitted a request under the OSG VO?
Thanks,
-Alain Deximo OSG RA

Dear Kyle Gross, Elizabeth Prout, Christopher Pipes, Alain Deximo (OSG VO RA/Sponsors),
An unauthenticated user; John A. Sandy <jsandy@fnal.gov> has requested a user certificate. Please determine this request's authenticity, and approve / disapprove at https://oim.grid.iu.edu/oim/certificateuser?id=66
NOTE: User is registering OIM contact & requesting new certificate: contact id:927 NOTE: Requested DN: /DC=com/DC=DigiCert-Grid/O=Open Science Grid/OU=People/CN=John A. Sandy 927
